Q: I have lumps in my armpits. Had them for over six years when I squeeze the black things come out other times it white. I Know this could be a sign of breast cancer but I m not saying it s what I have but I have pains that come and go in my breasts and in my lower abdominal area mostly in the ovary aera
A: Hi, dairy have gone through your question. I can understand your concern. You may have enlarged axillary lymph node. It may be due to reactive hyperplasia, tuberculosis, lymphoma or metastatic cancer. You should go for biopsy or fine needle aspiration cytology of lump and mammography of your breast. It will give you exact idea regarding diagnosis. Then you should take treatment accordingly. Hope I have answered your question, if you have any doubts then contact me at bit.ly/ Chat Doctor.
